answerText: Anita Sarkeesian[10] The Gamergate controversy initially sprung up over this game created by Zoe Quinn. Several people alleged that she had an affair with a Kotaku journalist who in turn gave this game a positive review.
heading: STIMPY |2015 | 1. Chicago A - MIT B | 12 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: Answer some questions about the hottest topic in internet-related current events, Gamergate. For 10 points each: [10] Gamergate supporters have frequently attacked this woman, a Canadian feminist cultural critic and creator of the YouTube series Tropes vs. Women in Video Games.
